docs.summary: Provides functionality for elements that can be checked.
description: `CheckedMixin` is a mixin that provides basic properties for elements on the page that can be checked.
[Mixins](https://support.wix.com/en/article/velo-about-mixins) provide functionality that other elements can inherit and use.
Mixins are not elements. You cannot add mixins to a page in the Editor like other `$w` elements, and mixins are not meant to be used directly
For example, you would not write code like this, because it is out of context:
Instead, you can code the following, because checkboxes are elements

docs.summary: Sets or gets whether the element is checked or not.

examples.title: Get whether an element is checked
Set an element to be checked
